narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Doctors Hospital at Renaissance, Ltd is a Clinic/Center, Ambulatory Surgical provider based in Edinburg, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $65.1M in Medicaid payments across 2.4M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $65.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
